byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

abstract: Warburg Pincus agrees to invest $500 million in Independence Resources Management, becoming one of few private equity firms to strike major petroleum sector deal amid uncertainty over fuel prices.
lead_paragraph: Warburg Pincus has become one of the few private equity firms to strike such a deal amid the uncertainty over fuel prices.

headline.main: Warburg Pincus to Invest $500 Million in Oil and Gas Firm I.R.M.

snippet: Warburg Pincus has become one of the few private equity firms to strike such a deal amid the uncertainty over fuel prices.
